verses.text: Meanwhile, \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w down|strong="H3427"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*. Soon \w the|strong="H5674"\w* kinsman-redeemer \f + \fr 4:1 \ft The Hebrew word for kinsman-redeemer or guardian-redeemer is a legal term for the kinsman who redeems or vindicates a relative; also in verses 3, 6, 8, and 14; see Leviticus 25:25–55.\f* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* whom \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w had|strong="H1162"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \w along|strong="H5674"\w*, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w Come|strong="H5927"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w*, \w my|strong="H5493"\w* \w friend|strong="H6423"\w*, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w down|strong="H3427"\w*.” \w So|strong="H5927"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w down|strong="H3427"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* Boaz \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H5892"\w* said, “\w Sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w*,” \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w they|strong="H3947"\w* did \w so|strong="H3947"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H7725"\w* said \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* kinsman-redeemer, “\w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w*, \w who|strong="H4376"\w* \w has|strong="H4124"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w is|strong="H4124"\w* \w selling|strong="H4376"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w piece|strong="H2513"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w that|strong="H7725"\w* belonged \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w our|strong="H7725"\w* brother Elimelech.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w thought|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w inform|strong="H5046"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H5971"\w* \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w back|strong="H3045"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w presence|strong="H5048"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w those|strong="H3427"\w* \w seated|strong="H3427"\w* \w here|strong="H1350"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w presence|strong="H5048"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. \w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w want|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H1540"\w* \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, do \w so|strong="H3808"\w*. \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \f + \fr 4:4 \ft Many Hebrew manuscripts, LXX, Vulgate, and Syriac; most Hebrew manuscripts he\f* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H5971"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H3427"\w* \w is|strong="H1350"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H1540"\w* \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w next|strong="H1350"\w* \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.” “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3588"\w* replied.

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* said, “\w On|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w also|strong="H8034"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moabitess|strong="H4125"\w*, \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w also|strong="H8034"\w* \w acquire|strong="H7069"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* widow \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w deceased|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w order|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w deceased|strong="H4191"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* kinsman-redeemer replied, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* myself, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* would \w jeopardize|strong="H7843"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* own \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*. Take \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w right|strong="H1353"\w* \w of|strong="H1350"\w* \w redemption|strong="H1353"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*.”

\w Now|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w former|strong="H6440"\w* \w times|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w redemption|strong="H1353"\w* \w or|strong="H7453"\w* \w exchange|strong="H8545"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* property, \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* legally binding \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w would|strong="H3478"\w* \w remove|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sandal|strong="H5275"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H7453"\w* party, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* confirmation \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1350"\w* \w the|strong="H7069"\w* kinsman-redeemer \w removed|strong="H8025"\w* \w his|strong="H8025"\w* \w sandal|strong="H5275"\w* \w and|strong="H5275"\w* said \w to|strong="H1350"\w* \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w*, “\w Buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w it|strong="H7069"\w* for yourself.”

\w At|strong="H3117"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w*, \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* said \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, “\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w buying|strong="H7069"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* belonged \w to|strong="H3027"\w* Elimelech, \w Chilion|strong="H3630"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w Mahlon|strong="H4248"\w*.

\w Moreover|strong="H1571"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w acquired|strong="H7069"\w* \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moabitess|strong="H4125"\w*, \w Mahlon|strong="H4248"\w*’s widow, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* wife, \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w deceased|strong="H4191"\w* \w through|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w disappear|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w among|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* brothers \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w home|strong="H4725"\w*. \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*.”

“\w We|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*,” \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*. “\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w woman|strong="H8034"\w* entering \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w* \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w Rachel|strong="H7354"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Leah|strong="H3812"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w together|strong="H7121"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* prosperous \w in|strong="H3478"\w* Ephrathah \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w famous|strong="H8034"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Perez|strong="H6557"\w*, whom \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w because|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w offspring|strong="H2233"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w young|strong="H5291"\w* \w woman|strong="H5291"\w*.” Boaz Marries Ruth

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* she \w became|strong="H3205"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* wife. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* relations \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w enabled|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w conceive|strong="H2032"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* she \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* women \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w*, “\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w left|strong="H7673"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w this|strong="H7121"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* kinsman-redeemer. \w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w become|strong="H7121"\w* \w famous|strong="H8034"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* renew \w your|strong="H7725"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w sustain|strong="H3557"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w age|strong="H7872"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* \w daughter-in-law|strong="H3618"\w*, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* loves \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w given|strong="H3205"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H3947"\w* \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w*, \w placed|strong="H3947"\w* \w him|strong="H3947"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w lap|strong="H2436"\w*, \w and|strong="H3947"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* nurse \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H3947"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3205"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7934"\w* \w women|strong="H7934"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w has|strong="H3205"\w* been \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w*,” \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H1931"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w Obed|strong="H5744"\w*. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w became|strong="H3205"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w father|strong="H3205"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*, \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w father|strong="H3205"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. The Line of David (Matthew 1:1–17; Luke 3:23–38)
Now these are \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w generations|strong="H8435"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w Perez|strong="H6557"\w*: Perez was the father of Hezron,
Hezron was the father of Ram, Ram was the father of Amminadab,

Amminadab was the father of Nahshon, Nahshon was the father of Salmon,\f + \fr 4:20 \ft A few Hebrew manuscripts, some LXX manuscripts, and Vulgate (see also verse 21 and LXX of 1 Chronicles 2:11); most Hebrew manuscripts Salma\f*
Salmon was the father of Boaz, Boaz was the father of Obed,
Obed was the father of Jesse, and Jesse was the father of David.
